```{r setup}
library(cardinalR)
library(langevitour)
```

```{r}
curvy_tree_data <- curvy_tree_with_noise(sample_size = 720, 
num_noise_dims = 2, min_noise = -0.05, max_noise = 0.05)

colnames(curvy_tree_data) <- paste0("x", 1:NCOL(curvy_tree_data))

langevitour(curvy_tree_data, pointSize = 2)
```

```{r}
tree_data <- tree_with_noise(sample_size = 490, num_noise_dims = 2, 
min_noise = -0.05, max_noise = 0.05)

```
